solution_line_template: He reserved {total_oranges} x {reserved_fraction} = <<{total_oranges}*{reserved_fraction}={reserved_oranges}>>{reserved_oranges} oranges for his friend.
Ha had {total_oranges} - {reserved_oranges} = <<{total_oranges}-{reserved_oranges}={oranges_after_reservation}>>{oranges_after_reservation} oranges to be sold yesterday.

But only {oranges_after_reservation} x {sold_yesterday_fraction} = <<{oranges_after_reservation}*{sold_yesterday_fraction}={oranges_sold_yesterday}>>{oranges_sold_yesterday} oranges were sold yesterday.

Since four oranges are rotten, then only {oranges_left_after_sale} - {rotten_oranges} = <<{oranges_left_after_sale}-{rotten_oranges}={oranges_left_to_sell_today}>>{oranges_left_to_sell_today} oranges are left to be sold today.
